meanings.definition: A person who makes something popular or widely known.
meanings.sent1: The popularizers of the new movie spread the word to everyone in town.
meanings.sent2: The popularizers of the book helped it become a bestseller.
meanings.sent3: The popularizers of the local bakery made everyone crave their pastries.
meanings.sent4: The popularizers of the fashion trend turned heads wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The popularizers of the catchy jingle made it impossible to forget.

meanings.definition: The act of making something popular or widely known.
meanings.sent1: The popularizers of the campaign worked tirelessly to reach a larger audience.
meanings.sent2: The popularizers of the song made it a hit on the radio.
meanings.sent3: The popularizers of the joke had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The popularizers of the rumor spread it like wildfire through the school.
meanings.sent5: The popularizers of the event drew in crowds from all over the city.
